segments.text: There is a new restaurant opening up in town next month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of food will they be serving ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My favorite , Mexican . And I've heard that the head chef is from San Paulo .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds like this is going to be authentic Mexican food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know the day they plan to open ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe we can make reservations ahead of time ?
segments.speaker: S2
